preferably, in order to progress the brainwashing remodelling safely and efficiently, that would be something natural for the pair, something that would be invoked repeatedly during the day.

what in cordelia would be the most suitable thing to turn into a trigger?
i didn't even have to think about it.
that bell――the sound of the church bell, which dominated the lives of all the people, from the royalty to the slaves.
i had set two times in the pair, 『normal time』 and 『brainwashing remodelling time』.
or, to put it another way, 『rational time』 and 『lust time』.
those would switch between each other, triggered by the church bell.
the sound of the bell chimed at 6 o'clock in the morning, 12 o'clock in the afternoon, and 6 o'clock in the evening.
i could change the time settings at will, depending on my circumstances at the moment, and the completion level of the pair's brainwashing.

m.

m.

the nanomachine implants that had been embedded in the pair were not all-powerful.

the 『rites for the coronation』 were a ritual which constituted a requirement for women to become the grand duchess, not to mention high-ranking members of the court (countesses, marquesses, etc.
one could say it was a ritual to show that maya was a suitable woman to be the grand duchess of cordelia, and similarly, that alicia was a worthy woman to succeed the count.
so, what kind of ceremonies were the 『rites for the coronation』?
first, there was one to personally experience, and overcome, the suffering of the women of the world, in order to show that the princess was a woman among women.
at the same time, there was one to show that she was an affectionate mother who loved her enemies.

“the suffering of the women of the world” meant to personally experience, with their own bodies, the daily lives of women who had been made to work as sex slaves in the various cities of the solar system.
